price: 105.Waxaad ka rumeysay riyadii. Sidaas baan ku abaal marinnaa sama falayaasha.
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
